ModMetaData.description:
Update of Hessras mod for RimWorld 1.1 https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=1229377025
[img]https://raw.githubusercontent.com/emipa606/RimWorld-Wrapper/master/Notice.png[/img]
[img]https://i.imgur.com/GYswkZ7.png[/img]
Support-chat: https://invite.gg/mlie
Non-steam version: https://github.com/emipa606/HarrowedLight
--- Original Description --- The current version includes : The Harrow, a faction of religious zealots that aim to purify the existence of all that is unholy within your colony. Starting with your very colonists' earthly vessels. To do so they use an assortment of goody-goods ! Thuribles, whips, flamethrowers and...candle holders ?
Compatibility : Should work with moooost other mods since it doesn't change the core game in any way. Future updates ?: Yes sir there'll be plenty. More badly balanced weapons, armors and factions that are out to kidnap your loved ones. Also better integration with research and upping the description of items. And more faction classes. Yes. Can I craft things from this mod ?: Yes, some. After you research Machining a peculiar shiny yellow altar will appear in the production tab. I can't see the sprite details, lad. Use the Camera+ mod.
